body_html:
@apaszke I addressed the comments. However, indexing into the _metadata (or _versions) with prefix is kinda not very nice.. For root prefix="". For its direct child prefix="linear.". All submodules will have the trailing dot, but we have to live with it since apparently module.add_module('', nn.Conv2d(1,1,1)) works. :/

I made it _metadata in case we want to add more stuff in future.

On the InstanceNorm warning, I replied to you above.
